events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is not what I paid for.
The system has identified and categorized this case under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
An available agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and details about the wrong item?
Could you kindly send a photo of the item you received as well as the packaging to help us verify the mistake quickly?
Here is the order number 123456789 and attached are the photos of the item I actually received that do not match what was shown on the website.
Thank you for the information and photos. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. Please keep the incorrect item for now.
Thank you for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the refund being processed and will wait for the confirmation email.
The agent has confirmed the refund process is completed and assured the customer that they will receive a confirmation shortly.
We are following up to ensure you have received the refund and to check if there is anything else we may assist you with today.
Since there has been no further response and the refund has been confirmed, your case has been closed. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how well your refund request was handled.
